definition: the Yongjiang river 甬江[Yong3 jiang1] through Ningbo 寧波|宁波[Ning2 bo1]/abbr. for Ningbo
variant of 桶[tong3], bucket/(classifier) cubic dry measure (5 pecks 五斗, approx half-liter)
path screened by walls on both sides
to dare to/to be brave enough to
to see what is right and act courageously (idiom, from Analects); to stand up bravely for the truth/acting heroically in a just cause
dauntless/to summon up courage and determination/using extreme force of will
to volunteer for/to offer to undertake
Bai Xianyong (1937-), Chinese-Taiwanese-US novelist of Hui descent

sentences.english: We climb technology peaks with passions.
Courage is easy to understand. "Courage means fearlessness ."
Yong blending with fear, is a realm of life.
sentences.chinese: 勇与畏相融，是人生的一种境界。

sentences.english: Aha, a "melancholy" and brave warrior, I like this word.
sentences.chinese: 哈，“忧”勇斗士，我喜欢这个字。

sentences.english: Restoring the reserve is now Mr Fan's top priority.
sentences.chinese: 修复保护区是范志勇他们目前的当务之急。

sentences.english: Wang Tao, sitting in my front, but in the back of Zhang Dayong.
sentences.chinese: 王涛坐在我的前，但在张大勇的后面。

sentences.english: But I’m no longer as eager to put the past behind me as I was in the past.
sentences.chinese: 但好汉不提当年勇，提起来好像我还活在过去一样。

sentences.english: Feng hesitates and unseals the letter with great courage finally.
sentences.chinese: 风犹豫了一下终于鼓起勇気打开了信封。

sentences.english: At this time, return XieYi reaches found that they, with a scuffle.
sentences.chinese: 此时，归来的谢易达发现两人，与安在勇一阵扭打。

sentences.english: Noguchi wanted always to work directly in whatever medium he chose.
sentences.chinese: 野口勇希望无论选择什么媒介，都可以直接对其加工。

sentences.english: Time for the headliner of the Athens games to play superman all over.
sentences.chinese: 雅典奥运会上破纪录者将勇创新高的时刻。

sentences.english: To Noguchi, all this was sculpture.
sentences.chinese: 而对于野口勇，这一切都只是雕塑。

sentences.english: Two lovers become spouses eventually, home Yang from this much brave of a women will.
sentences.chinese: 两位有情人终成眷属，杨家自此又多了一位巾帼勇将。

sentences.english: Yong blending with fear, constitute a driving force, along with his own ahead.
sentences.chinese: 勇与畏相融，构成了一种动力，带着自己向前冲。

definition: barley/to moo/to seek or obtain/old variant of 侔[mou2]/old variant of 眸[mou2]
squad of five soldiers/to associate with/five (banker's anti-fraud numeral)
tiger stripes/tiger cub/(old) classifier for troops
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy
incorruptible/honest/inexpensive/to investigate (old)/side wall of a traditional Chinese house (old)
surname Zou/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1046-256 BC) in the southeast of Shandong Province
